ygData.subject: all's quiet..
ygData.msgSnippet: i may not be an expert on mailing lists, but this one seems pretty damn quiet. there s gotta be something to do with it :) like an rp argument of Innoruuk vs
ygData.messageBody:
i may not be an expert on mailing lists, but this one seems pretty damn
quiet. there's gotta be something to do with it :) like an rp argument of
Innoruuk vs Bertoxxulous for who makes the better god for SK.. or just
updates with any hints people come across that lead to how to obtain the
darkreavers (or other SK holy weapons). even if you just find something
really interesting (black-colored plate mail? a rare SK-only spell? what
happens if you max your faction with the crushbone orcs and give king crush
a hail?). we gotta make NOISE here! too much silence drives me nuts, and you
dont wanna see me when i'm nuts ;)

Beld
